Content.Text:
<NAME_MOB_DORLIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You've made 10,000,000G worth of sales?
...Your legend will be told for generations.

<NAME_MOB_DORLIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I hear you've made more than 1,000,000G worth
of sales. That's amazing.

<NAME_MOB_DORLIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You've broken 100,000G worth of sales? Hmm,
not spectacular, but decent. Congratulations on
a good start.

<NAME_MOB_DORLIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've wanted this for a long time. And now it's
mine.

<NAME_MOB_DORLIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
They didn't have what I wanted, so I bought
something else.

<NAME_MOB_DORLIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Here I am again, with 10G left in my pocket...

<NAME_MOB_DORLIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Whenever I've got a tough choice, I look at all
my options very carefully. There's nothing I hate
more than buyer's remorse.

<NAME_MOB_DORLIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
They didn't have anything I wanted.

<NAME_MOB_DORLIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Turns out I didn't bring enough cash. Guess I'll
have to come back later.

<NAME_MOB_DORLIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
All right, off to buy some candy!

<NAME_MOB_DORLIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've got a real sweet tooth.

<NAME_MOB_DORLIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hm, is there anything I want that's still here...?
